record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1909. Fourth row: N. B. Johnson (trainer), Ira Nelson Davenport, Matthias S. Gerend, David Edwin Smith, Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), Clark George Sauer, Walter Scott Kassulker, and Walter Peter Steffen (assistant coach); third row: Thomas Kelley, Benjamin Harrison Badenoch, Charles Martin Rademacher, and Arthur Charles Hoffman; second row: Herman John Ehrhorn, William Joseph Sunderland, Harlan Orville Page (captain), Oscar William Worthwine, and William Lucas Crawley; first row: Marcus Andrew Hirschl, Hume Cliffton Young, Rufus Boynton Rogers, and James Austin Menaul.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on heavy, stiff, photo album paper. Attached caption.
